labs.title: Lab 1 — CIA Triad Scenario Matcher
labs.description: Match real-world scenarios to the primary CIA Triad component impacted. Designed to reinforce reasoning and classification before introducing security tools.

labs.title: Lab 2 — Account Security Clinic
labs.description: A guided web clinic covering passwords, MFA, recovery, and phishing-resistant authentication—built for classroom discussion and practical decision-making.
